project.name: Game Đánh Vần
project.description: Educational game for kids to learn Vietnamese spelling.

features.name: Voice Recognition
features.description: Recognizes spoken Vietnamese words. Includes special normalization handling for loanwords (e.g., 'pi a nô' -> 'piano') and 'đ'/'d' conversion.

features.name: Explore Mode
features.description: Learn words with images and speech.

features.name: Shop & Stickers
features.description: Earn stars to buy stickers and customize themes.

features.name: Backup/Restore
features.description: Backup data to ZIP file (JSON + Images).

gotchas: Voice recognition for 'Ca na đa' requires exact normalization.
Zip Slip vulnerability protection implemented in BackupManager.
conventions: Keystore credentials must be in local.properties
